name: The Rude Sand Storm
description:
The town of Sandy Shades is terrorised by the rude Sand Storm

The residents need your help! Sand Storm took beloved items from their owners and scattered them around the desert. Wander around, explore, solve puzzles and avoid the raging storm! Lower the rage of the storm by retrieving the lost items and bringing happiness back to the Sandy Shades.

Talk to the residents, find out what they miss and bring them what their hearts desire.
Explore the desert to find lost items, solve puzzles, and bring the residents their beloved items they've lost.
Click the left and right mouse buttons to use your hands to grab items, interact with residents and other objects.
Press Q and E to drop items you're holding.
Use W, A, S, D to move around the map and hold Shift to run from the storm.
Beware the rude Sand Storm! Find yourself in it and you will be lost to the wind!

This game was created during Global Game Jam Online 2021, in the theme "Lost & Found".
